languages.text: "Даже корабельный исповедник отрекся от ложных заветов, сам взрастил народного героя, Немезита! А вы обоих убили!"
"Even the ship's confessor renounced the false covenants and went on to raise the folk hero, Nemesite! And you killed both of them!"
languages.original_text: "Даже корабельный исповедник отрекся от ложных заветов, сам взрастил народного героя, Немезита! А вы обоих убили!"

traits.locale_text: "Even the ship's confessor renounced the false covenants and raised the folk hero, Nemesite! And you killed them both!"
"Even the ship's confessor renounced the false covenants and raised the folk hero, Nemesite! And you killed them both!"
"Even the ship's confessor renounced the false covenants and went on to raise the folk hero, Nemesite! And you killed both of them!"
"Even the ship's confessor renounced the false covenants and went on to raise the folk hero, Nemesite! And you killed both of them!"
"Even the ship's confessor renounced the false covenants and went on to raise the folk hero, Nemesite! And you killed both of them!"
"Even the ship's confessor renounced the false covenants and went on to raise the folk hero, Nemesite! And you killed both of them!"

languages.text: «¡Incluso el confesor de la nave renunció a las falsas doctrinas y crio al héroe del pueblo, Nemesitio! ¡Y los mataste a los dos!».
languages.original_text: "Even the ship's confessor renounced the false covenants and went on to raise the folk hero, Nemesite! And you killed both of them!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Incluso el confesor de la nave renunció a las falsas doctrinas y crio al héroe del pueblo, Nemesitio! ¡Y los mataste a los dos!».

languages.text: 「船の聴罪師でさえ偽りの誓約を手放し、民の英雄ネメサイトを育て続けた！そしてあなたは、そのふたりを殺したのよ！」
languages.original_text: "Even the ship's confessor renounced the false covenants and went on to raise the folk hero, Nemesite! And you killed both of them!"

traits.locale_text: 「船の聴罪師でさえ偽りの誓約を手放し、民の英雄ネメサイトを育て続けた！そしてあなたは、そのふたりを殺したのよ！」

languages.text: “就连船上的告解神父都放弃了虚假的信仰，将平民英雄涅墨斯特复活过来！可你却把他们两个都杀了！”
languages.original_text: "Even the ship's confessor renounced the false covenants and went on to raise the folk hero, Nemesite! And you killed both of them!"

traits.locale_text: “就连船上的告解神父都放弃了虚假的信仰，将平民英雄涅墨斯特复活过来！可你却把他们两个都杀了！”

languages.text: "Selbst der Beichtvater des Schiffs hat den falschen Grundsätzen widersagt und den Volkshelden Nemesit auferstehen lassen! Und Ihr habt sie beide getötet!"
languages.original_text: "Even the ship's confessor renounced the false covenants and went on to raise the folk hero, Nemesite! And you killed both of them!"

traits.locale_text: "Selbst der Beichtvater des Schiffs hat den falschen Grundsätzen widersagt und den Volkshelden Nemesit auferstehen lassen! Und Ihr habt sie beide getötet!"

languages.text: « Même le confesseur du vaisseau avait renoncé aux fausses conventions et prêté main-forte au héros du peuple, Némésite ! Mais vous les avez tués tous les deux ! »
languages.original_text: "Even the ship's confessor renounced the false covenants and went on to raise the folk hero, Nemesite! And you killed both of them!"

traits.locale_text: « Même le confesseur du vaisseau avait renoncé aux fausses conventions et prêté main-forte au héros du peuple, Némésite ! Mais vous les avez tués tous les deux ! »

languages.text: "Geminin günah çıkarıcısı bile yalan antlarından dönüp halk kahramanı Nemezit'i yetiştirmeye karar verdi! Sen ise ikisini de katlettin!"
languages.original_text: "Even the ship's confessor renounced the false covenants and went on to raise the folk hero, Nemesite! And you killed both of them!"
